Cash and Equivalents: cash and cash equivalents at carrying value
Marketable Securities (Short-term): debt securities available for sale excluding accrued interest
federal funds sold and securities purchased under agreements to resell
financial instruments owned at fair value
financial instruments owned corporate debt at fair value
financial instruments owned corporate equities at fair value
financial instruments owned other sovereign government obligations at fair value
financial instruments owned u s government and agency obligations at fair value
securities purchased under agreements to resell
Prepaid and Other Current Assets: cash reserve deposit required and made
financial instruments owned derivatives and other contractual agreements at fair value
financial instruments owned physical commodities at fair value
Receivables: accrued fees and other revenue receivable
financing receivable excluding accrued interest after allowance for credit loss
loans receivable held for sale net not part of disposal group
receivables from brokers dealers and clearing organizations

Long-term Investments: debt securities held to maturity excluding accrued interest after allowance for credit loss
financial instruments owned principal investments at fair value
other investments and securities at cost
Other Non-Current Assets: notes and loans receivable net noncurrent

Accumulated Other Comprehensive Income: accumulated other comprehensive income loss net of cumulative debt valuation adjustments after tax
accumulated other comprehensive income loss net of tax
Common Stock and APIC: common stock issued employee stock trust

Other Current Liabilities: interest and dividends payable current and noncurrent
financial instruments sold not yet purchased at fair value
financial instruments sold not yet purchased corporate debt
obligation to return securities received as collateral
Short-term Debt: securities sold under agreements to repurchase

__unmapped__: debt longterm and shortterm combined amount
debt securities available for sale and held to maturity
redeemable noncontrolling interest equity carrying amount
